info.name: mint essentials
info.description: An attempt to remove the ads & bloat from mint's site to actually make it usable, with an emphasis on net worth & clean design.
info.additionalInfo:
JANUARY 2018
---------------------

Fixed formatting issues with net worth & the left column, removed goals, ways to save & the help button. Fixed account names to use true nicknames & fixed spacing issues.

APRIL 2017
-----------

Updated to remove tax ads & help sticky.


FEATURES
-------------------------
- Clean login page
- Accounts page: remove sponsored info
